text: The Clock King is the name of three fictional Batman characters from the DC Comics universe who use magical watches to turn back time or to go to the future. The character can also freeze time. The Clock King uses anything related to time to help him do his crimes. The first Clock King debuted in World's Finest Comics #111 (August 1960), and was created by France Herron and Lee Elias. == Powers and abilities == He has no superpowers or abilities. He wears a clock mask, a cape, and a blue suit with clock drawings on it. Clock King is a master planner and sometimes uses clock-themed gadgetry. == In other media == Additionally, an original incarnation, Temple Fugate, appears in shows set in the DC Animated Universe, voiced by Alan Rachins. Category:Batman characters Category:DC Comics characters
title: Clock King
